department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: Presents recent advances in the field of the aeronomy of earth’s atmosphere and ionosphere.
goal.ch: Presents recent advances in the field of the aeronomy of earth’s atmosphere and ionosphere.

content.en:
Mesosphere-Lower Thermosphere Dynamics and Chemistry
Vertical Coupling by Upward Propagating Waves
Ionospheric Electrodynamics and Structuring
content.ch:
Mesosphere-Lower Thermosphere Dynamics and Chemistry
Vertical Coupling by Upward Propagating Waves
Ionospheric Electrodynamics and Structuring

textbook.en: Aeronomy of the Earth‘s Atmosphere and Ionosphere Editors: Mangalathayil Ali Abdu, Dora Pancheva https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-94-007-0326-1
textbook.ch: Aeronomy of the Earth‘s Atmosphere and Ionosphere Editors: Mangalathayil Ali Abdu, Dora Pancheva https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-94-007-0326-1
